Pre-Game Insights: India are now on a roll, with six wins from six games. They look like the best team in the tournament, by far and will be a formidable challenge for Sri Lanka, who will not want to remember the previous meeting between the sides in the Asia Cup final.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India vs Sri Lanka have faced off on 167 occasions in ODIs, with India winning 98 of those matches.
India will play their seventh match of the 2023 World Cup when they take on Sri Lanka at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai, on 2 November.
Others: The match will begin at 2:00pm IST.
